# union(_:)

**Instance Method**

Creates a bounding box containing the current bounds and the specified bounds.

## Declaration

```swift
func union(_ other: BoundingBox) -> BoundingBox
```

## Parameters

- **other**: Another bounding box.

## Return Value

The new bounding box.
title: union(_:)
